home.title: Welcome to
home.description: Our volunteer team focuses on developing open-source applications to help you in your daily routine. Wanna join us?

projects.title: Featured projects
projects.description: A selection of projects we have developed through Zide

presentation.zide: Zide is a collective of passionate developers building innovative tools, whether for fellow developers or for the general public.
presentation.team: Our aim is to build a network of motivated people who want to create relevant projects or contribute to those of others in their free time. We welcome anyone interested in programming to join our community and share their ideas with us!
presentation.product: We mainly craft digital products that are intuitive, efficient, and deeply customizable. Designed to simplify the user experience while enabling powerful workflows.

languages.title: Languages we like
languages.description: The languages, frameworks and tools we are used to working with. We are open to all solutions adapted to project needs.

team.title: Meet the team
team.description: Developers passionate about programming and innovative projects

banner.title: Our projects
banner.description: Find out more about the projects we have realised and those we are currently working on

collective.title: Zide is a software development collective creating innovative tools for everyone.
collective.description: Driven by passion and curiosity, We craft digital products that are intuitive, efficient and highly customizable, built to simplify the user experience while unlocking powerful workflows.

discord.title: Join Discord Group
discord.description: Keep in touch with the latest updates and project announcements by joining our official Discord group. If you're a developer, take part in our technology watch or our projects.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introDesc: Zide is a non-profit developer collective. We minimize data collection and never sell your personal information.
privacyPolicy.introRespect: This policy explains what data we collect and why, transparently.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectedIntro: We collect the bare minimum. We don't collect any personal data directly since there's no registration or accounts on our site.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectedNone: We keep anonymized visit logs only for site security.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectedAdsense: We use Google AdSense cookies only to fund our servers with non-intrusive ads.
privacyPolicy.purposesIntro: Our uses are very limited. For technical support, when you contact us via email, we answer your questions and delete exchanges after resolution.
privacyPolicy.adsenseTitle: For server funding, Google ads help pay for hosting. 100% of revenue goes to infrastructure costs with no personal profit.
privacyPolicy.securityPurpose: For security, we keep logs for protection against attacks and spam. These logs are automatically deleted after 6 months.
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro: We use the strict minimum. Technical cookies are necessary for site functionality. Google advertising cookies are only used with your consent.
privacyPolicy.cookiesManagement: You can refuse advertising cookies without affecting the site functionality.
privacyPolicy.sharingIntro: We only share your data with our hosting provider (necessary for operation) and Google (only if you accept advertising).
privacyPolicy.retentionIntro: We keep your data as briefly as possible.
privacyPolicy.retentionDetails: Security logs are kept for 6 months maximum. Contact emails are deleted after problem resolution. Cookies last 13 months maximum according to Google standards.
privacyPolicy.rightsDesc: You have full control of your data. You can request access, correction, deletion, limitation, object to processing, or get your data in readable format.
privacyPolicy.rightsExercise: Contact us at contact@zide.fr to exercise these rights. Response within 1 month.
privacyPolicy.rightsComplaint: If there's a problem, you can contact CNIL (cnil.fr).
privacyPolicy.securityDesc: Standard protection: HTTPS, regular updates, restricted access. No system is 100% secure. We do our best with our volunteer collective resources.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc: This policy may change. Update date at top of page.
privacyPolicy.contactDesc: Questions about this policy: contact@zide.fr - Response within 5 days

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: By using the Zide site, you accept these simple terms.
termsOfService.introductionScope: Zide is a volunteer developer collective sharing open source projects.
termsOfService.introductionAcceptance: If you don't accept these terms, don't use the site.
termsOfService.objectDesc: We offer free open source projects, developer resources and a collaborative community.
termsOfService.objectDetails: The site is provided 'as is' and may change without notice.
termsOfService.accessDesc: The site is free and open to everyone with no registration required.
termsOfService.accessDetails: We may interrupt service for maintenance. We ask for respect towards other users.
termsOfService.accountsIntro: If you contribute to our projects, you must respect law and other users.
termsOfService.accountsDetails: No illegal or hateful content. Contributions follow open source licenses.
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyDesc: Site content is free for non-commercial use with attribution. Source code follows each project's license (MIT, Apache, GPL...).
termsOfService.trademarksDesc: The Zide logo is reserved for collective use.
termsOfService.advertisingDesc: We use Google AdSense ads to pay for servers.
termsOfService.advertisingDetails: 100% of revenue goes to technical costs with no profit. We are a volunteer collective, not a commercial business.
termsOfService.externalLinksDesc: The site is provided 'as is', with no warranty.
termsOfService.externalLinksDetails: We have no responsibility for external links. For open source code, see specific licenses. As a volunteer collective, our resources are limited.
termsOfService.conductRulesIntro: Be respectful by avoiding spam, site attacks, illegal or hateful content.
termsOfService.conductRulesDetails: Respect copyrights and limit yourself to normal site usage.
termsOfService.conductRulesConsequences: Any violation may result in access blocking.
termsOfService.terminationDesc: These terms may change. The update date is shown at the top of the page.
